title: Search in associated items when type cannot be found

labels.name: C-enhancement
labels.description: Category: An issue proposing an enhancement or a PR with one.

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-suggestion-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: suggestions generated by the compiler applied by cargo fix

labels.name: D-papercut
labels.description: Diagnostic error that needs small tweaks

body:
[Given the following code](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=e0d291d80bd21afde1f4661358ec95f8):

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/1fb612bd15bb3ef098fd24c20d0727de573b4410/src/test/ui/associated-types/associated-types-eq-1.rs#L4-L11

we currently show

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/1fb612bd15bb3ef098fd24c20d0727de573b4410/src/test/ui/associated-types/associated-types-eq-1.stderr#L1-L7

But the typo checks should also look at the associated types of all the locally accessible types and provide a reasonable suggestion.

In this specific case of assignment, we could also look at the type of `boo` for an appropriate type to supply.
